column4: coulnd't boot, but after starting livecd i discovered that all my files in "/" was gone, but i just found all my files in lost+found... is there a way to recover it safely? there is a lot of folders, and i'm not sure where everything goes...
just salvage the usefull data (your home folder) form lost+found and reinstall
it seams that most of my "/" is in one folder, "#34"
with usefull data i mean personal data you can no recostruct and is vital
